biography:
Naoto Takenaka (竹中直人; March 20, 1956 ) is a Japanese actor, comedian, singer, and director from Yokohama, Kanagawa, affiliated with From First Production. He is married to former idol singer and actress Midori Kinouchi.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Naoto Takenaka, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Naoto Takenaka
